About Page


This page tells you a little about me.

I attended Purdue University and graduated with a Bachelor’s in Data Science and Math in May of 2022. I currently work for Intuitive Surgical as a data engineer. Some of my passions include writing music, recreational programming, and math.My blog on this website was started to contain the results or notes about personal projects I work on as well as miscellanea about what’s currently going on in my life.

This site was compiled via the Ruby blogging library, Jekyll.
